channel.title: WIRED UK
channel.description: Future Science, Culture & Technology News and Reviews

item.description: The British unicorn’s simulation technology can build video games. Can it help us understand the coronavirus crisis?

item.description: Netflix's Tiger King has made Joe Exotic a star – you can buy unofficial stickers, socks and even a burger. But is it right to celebrate a convicted felon in this way? And what does it say about our obsession with true crime?

item.dc:creator: Amelia Tait
item.merlin:teaser: Netflix's Tiger King has made Joe Exotic a star – you can buy unofficial stickers, socks and even a burger. But is it right to celebrate a convicted felon in this way? And what does it say about our obsession with true crime?
